subject: Re: Book Question on Kogai
msgSnippet: Thanks much Jim!  I got thrown by the use of the different names in the same Sotheby catalog.  One listing would be for Ko Kogai, another for Furukogai, etc.

Thanks much Jim!  I got thrown by the use of the different names in the 
sa=
me Sotheby catalog.  One listing would be for Ko Kogai, another for 
Furuko=
gai, etc.  Possibly they had different people doing the 
attributions there=
fore creating an apparent inconsistency.  
I wish it was as easy to find a =
copy of the damn book as it was to find 
the answer! LOL  It's like trying =
to pick up a copy of Furukawa's 
Collection -- not easy.
